square_image_search.description: at least three unique English keywords related to the answer. without commas, in English! (example: Zebra savana africa ).
square_image_search.title: Square Image Search

image_search.description: 2-4 unique specific English keywords for image search. without commas, in English! (example: Zebra cub savana africa)
image_search.title: Image Search

question.description: ask a question about the subject, the player will answer by clicking on one of 3 image options. example: question-which image represents france? answer-image #2 shows eifel tower.
question.title: Question

right_answer_feedback.description: feedback to give when the player answers correctly.
right_answer_feedback.title: Right Answer Feedback

hint.description: hint how to answer the question correctly.
hint.title: Hint

answers.description: different unique image search answers to the question, only one is the correct answer
answers.title: Answers

description.const: a text question on the subject; player click on one of three image options.
description.title: Description
